ComicInfo.Summary:
Now that Katie has learned more about Vampblade, and why killing space vampires feels oh so good, it’s time for both to return to the other-dimensional nest to score a big hit. Can Katie pull off her bold double life gamble, and if she does hack her way out of this showdown with the grotesque parasitic horde, will she be irrevocably changed?!?
Features regular, “Risqué”, “Action Figure”, “booty”, and “90s Cheesecake” variant covers.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | B | Risque Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | C | Action Figure Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Winston Young | 3 | D | Risque Action Figure Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 4 | E | Booty Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dennis Budd | 5 | F | 90's Cheesecake Risque Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Andrew Mangum | 6 | Note: The digital edition (4/27/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
